parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To try, tempt, test. From peira; to test, i.e. Endeavor, scrutinize, entice, discipline.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 1st Person Singular
str2: To try, tempt, test. From peira; to test, i.e. Endeavor, scrutinize, entice, discipline.
For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.
Untried, inexperienced, untempted, incapable of being tempted. Untried, i.e. Not temptable.
Bad, evil, in the widest sense. Apparently a primary word; worthless, i.e. depraved, or injurious.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To try, tempt, test. From peira; to test, i.e. Endeavor, scrutinize, entice, discipline.
